description: Single storey basement extension including swimming pool with internal connection to existing basement. Demolition of infill at rear lower ground and ground floor levels, construction of part brick and part glazed replacement infill extension. Removal of security bars to lower ground floor front windows, replacement with frameless security glazing. Removal of spiral staircase at rear of No 43 and linking of upper ground floor terrace areas of Nos 42 and 43. Replacement front door. Alteration to fenestration at lower ground rear extension at No 42. Internal works to all floors, including installation of passenger lift, lowering and waterproofing of vaults and creation of additional openings to vaults, relocation of kitchen to the raised ground floor front room within No.42 , internal connections, and provision of new spine walls and double doors to separate the front and rear rooms at first floor level within Nos 42 and 4
